title: I have have a Pixel 3a XL, I want to put some private pics into a locked folder how do I do it
content: I have a Pixel 3a XL. I have pictures I would like to put in a secure photo vault/folder is there anyway I can do this with the phone I have? I have tried to to see if I can make a secure folder in Google photos to no avail.  Any help/suggestions are very much welcome
